nodes.name: Left Center Door
nodes.note: The center door that is accessible from the grapple block side

nodes.name: Right Center Door
nodes.note: The center door that is accessible from the puyo side

to.note: It's possible to climb up suitless without a jump assist by breaking the top left Puyo free and then freezing it while it falls, but it's very very tricky to get 4 shots off in time to freeze it, which is what the beam requirements are for.
Entering from the right door gives a weird alignment glitch, but it's possible to exit back through the door and that triggers the event flag
